mention.text: A Filipino serving with the U.S. Navy
the eruption when his car collided with a bus on an ash-slicked road north of the Subic Bay naval base
Angeles , a city of more than 300,000 people adjacent to the base.
a city of more than 300,000 people adjacent to the base.
35 miles southwest of the volcano , survivors
director of the Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology.
Punongbayan , of the Philippine Institute of Vulcanology and Seismology
The Americans who fled Clark with a few belongings on Monday
the Taal volcano , about 50 miles south of Manila , in 1965
the Taal volcano , about 50 miles south of Manila
an explosion of superheated gas , ashes and rocks that killed 38 people.
